name: set_shadow
description: Defines the shadow that will be drawn for this <%= doc_class_name %>.
This function can take **either** an enum <%= type 'ShadowType' %> value for pre-defined shadows,
or it can take a previously-loaded <%= type 'Texture' %> for a custom shadow.

parameters.name: shadow
parameters.desc: The shadow you want to be drawn under this <%= doc_class_name %>.
